verses.verse: Therefore <S%G863>leaving<s%> the <S%G746>principles<s%> of the <S%G3056>doctrine<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> let us <S%G5342>go<s%> on to <S%G5051>perfection;<s%> not <S%G2598>laying<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> the <S%G2310>foundation<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> from <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> and of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>

Of the <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> of <S%G909>baptisms,<s%> and of <S%G1936>laying<s%> <S%G1936>on<s%> of <S%G5495>hands,<s%> and of <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2917>judgment.<s%>
And <S%G5124>this<s%> will we <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2010>permit.<s%>

For it is <S%G102>impossible<s%> for <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G530>once<s%> <S%G5461>enlightened,<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1089>tasted<s%> of the <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G1431>gift,<s%> and were <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G3353>partakers<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%>
And <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1089>tasted<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G1411>powers<s%> of the <S%G165>world<s%> to <S%G3195>come,<s%>

If they shall <S%G3895>fall<s%> <S%G3895>away,<s%> to <S%G340>renew<s%> them <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G3341>repentance;<s%> seeing they <S%G388>crucify<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G388>afresh,<s%> and <S%G3856>put<s%> him to an <S%G3856>open<s%> <S%G3856>shame.<s%>

For the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G4095>drinks<s%> in the <S%G5205>rain<s%> that <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G4178>oft<s%> on it, and <S%G5088>brings<s%> <S%G5088>forth<s%> <S%G1008>herbs<s%> <S%G2111>meet<s%> for them by <S%G3739>whom<s%> it is <S%G1090>dressed,<s%> <S%G3335>receives<s%> <S%G2129>blessing<s%> from <S%G2316>God:<s%>

But that which <S%G1627>bears<s%> <S%G173>thorns<s%> and <S%G5146>briers<s%> is <S%G96>rejected,<s%> and is <S%G1451>near<s%> to <S%G2671>cursing;<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> is to be <S%G2740>burned.<s%>

But, <S%G27>beloved,<s%> we are <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> things of you, and things that <S%G2192>accompany<s%> <S%G4991>salvation,<s%> <S%G1499>though<s%> we <S%G3779>thus<s%> <S%G2980>speak.<s%>

For <S%G2316>God<s%> is not <S%G94>unrighteous<s%> to <S%G1950>forget<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> and <S%G2873>labor<s%> of <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1731>showed<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> his <S%G3686>name,<s%> in that you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1247>ministered<s%> to the <S%G40>saints,<s%> and do <S%G1247>minister.<s%>

And we <S%G1937>desire<s%> that <S%G1538>every<s%> one of you do <S%G1731>show<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4710>diligence<s%> to the <S%G4136>full<s%> <S%G4136>assurance<s%> of <S%G1680>hope<s%> to the <S%G5056>end:<s%>
That you be not <S%G3576>slothful,<s%> but <S%G3402>followers<s%> of them who <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G3115>patience<s%> <S%G2816>inherit<s%> the <S%G1860>promises.<s%>

For when <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1861>made<s%> <S%G1861>promise<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G1893>because<s%> he <S%G2192>could<s%> <S%G3660>swear<s%> by <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3187>greater,<s%> he <S%G3660>swore<s%> by <S%G1438>himself,<s%>
<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G2229>Surely<s%> <S%G2129>blessing<s%> I will <S%G2127>bless<s%> you, and <S%G4129>multiplying<s%> I will <S%G4129>multiply<s%> you.
And <S%G3779>so,<s%> after he had <S%G3114>patiently<s%> <S%G3114>endured,<s%> he <S%G2013>obtained<s%> the <S%G1860>promise.<s%>

For <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> <S%G3660>swear<s%> by the <S%G3187>greater:<s%> and an <S%G3727>oath<s%> for <S%G951>confirmation<s%> is to them an <S%G4009>end<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G485>strife.<s%>

<S%G1722>Wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1014>willing<s%> <S%G4054>more<s%> <S%G4054>abundantly<s%> to <S%G1925>show<s%> to the <S%G2818>heirs<s%> of <S%G1860>promise<s%> the <S%G276>immutability<s%> of his <S%G1012>counsel,<s%> <S%G3315>confirmed<s%> it by an <S%G3727>oath:<s%>

That by <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G276>immutable<s%> things, in <S%G3739>which<s%> it was <S%G102>impossible<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G5574>lie,<s%> we might <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2478>strong<s%> <S%G3874>consolation,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> have <S%G2703>fled<s%> for <S%G2703>refuge<s%> to lay <S%G2902>hold<s%> on the <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G4295>set<s%> <S%G4295>before<s%> us:

<S%G3739>Which<s%> hope we <S%G2192>have<s%> as an <S%G45>anchor<s%> of the <S%G5590>soul,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G804>sure<s%> and <S%G949>steadfast,<s%> and which <S%G1535>enters<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> that <S%G2082>within<s%> the <S%G2665>veil;<s%>

<S%G3699>Where<s%> the <S%G4274>forerunner<s%> is for us <S%G1525>entered,<s%> even <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> an <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchisedec.<s%>
